verses.roman:
'śrī-gopāla' nāma mora,--govardhana-dhārī
vajrera sthāpita, āmi ihāṅ adhikārī

synonyms: śrī-gopāla nāma—the name Śrī Gopāla; mora—My; govardhana-dhārī—the lifter of Govardhana Hill; vajrera—by Vajra, the grandson of Kṛṣṇa; sthāpita—installed; āmi—I; ihāṅ—here; adhikārī—the authority.
translation: "My name is Gopāla. I am the lifter of Govardhana Hill. I was installed by Vajra, and here I am the authority.
